name: Raspberry Cream Donut
description:
Jammy Raspberry Cream Donut 

Watch the video here: 

https://youtu.be/JQNX2Y57F40
author: RUG_ly

reviews.text: Great recipe I went for a 30ml right off the bat and didnt get around to vaping it allowing it to steep for about 10 days. I found myself not wanting to pull the wick out and switch to something new once finished

This is really something special. Ever since I started doing DIY I've been chasing a quality, well balanced donut recipe that doesn't need a long steep but has enough going on that I can vape it all day without getting bored. Several years later, I think I've found The One. Big ups to you RUG_ly! Looking forward to trying some of your other recipes soon.
Another great recipe. This one is good enough off the shake I had to make a second 30 ml to steep.
